AUTHOR: Linley#7952
INSTALL_MSG: [p]tweets to see commands. Do [p]tweetset to find commands for setting consumer key and secret and access token and secret. If you need these, visit https://apps.twitter.com/ and create an application. This plugin only needs read only permissions as it will only read public information
NAME: Tweets
SHORT: Cog for streaming info from Twitter
DESCRIPTION: Gets public information from Twitter's API
